conclusion: Need to calculate the area under the velocity-time graph for the interval to determine distance.
Identify the interval from t = 10 seconds to t = 15 seconds.
At t = 10 seconds, velocity is 20 m/s; at t = 15 seconds, velocity is 10 m/s.
The graph shows a linear decrease in velocity forming a trapezoid.
The formula for the area of a trapezoid is used to calculate distance.
Calculate the area using Base1 = 20 m/s, Base2 = 10 m/s, Height = 5 seconds.
